title: EPIC-004: POST /dialogs - Create Dialog

epic.title: FastAPI Backend - API Layer & HTTP Routing
epic.goal: Build RESTful API with FastAPI: chat endpoint with SSE streaming, dialog management, token balance, admin operations, with JWT auth and request validation

deliverables: Production-ready implementation strictly for this story scope
Automated tests required by acceptance criteria
Minimal documentation/README updates required to run/test the change
acceptance_criteria: POST /dialogs with body: {title?, system_prompt?, model_name?, agent_config?}
Call Dialog Manager to create dialog
Return 201 Created with dialog entity (id, user_id, settings, created_at)
Return 400 if invalid model_name or agent_config
Unit tests with mocked Dialog Manager, integration tests with DB
description: Implement endpoint to create dialog with optional settings (title, system_prompt, model_name, agent_config). Enforce user authentication.
